properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING
   5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. IN PROGRESS ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      04-16.02N 049-28.65W AND 04-14.08N 049-18.30W.
   B. 02 OCT ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      05-28.58N 050-47.32W AND 05-03.35N 050-18.47W.
   C. 03 OCT ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      05-32.12N 049-30.35W AND 05-30.62N 050-45.55W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 04 OCT 12.
